projectGridLines.stationName: Melimu Edutech Pvt Ltd - Non Tech
projectGridLines.title: Define optimized offline training roasters for Universities in Africa (26 countries)
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Melimu extensively work with universities in Africa in 26 countries, we run digital schools for them. Project is to define training roasters for all the universities considering constraints defined. 

Skill sets: Operations Management, Supply Chain Management 

Expected learning: Implementation of operation management in real-life and write algorithms 

Specific courses required for project execution:  Operations Management
